title: When can something be said to have become part of the pop culture? - Quora
tags: Culture of the United States of America

response.answer_text: When around 1/3 to 1/2 of your friends (or the internet these days) start discussing about these "things" in references which they don't bother to explain and you are just supposed to know. If this happens multiple times, you can assume it is a part of pop-culture. Another hint would be: someone somewhere would be wearing a T-Shirt inspired from this "thing".
